Name: Prince Derendil
Traits: Wounded Fury. While it has 10 hit points or fewer, Prince Derendil has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.
Actions: Multiattack. Prince Derendil makes two claw attacks. Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
